entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Delta
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
